name: Bots Rush
description:
No one asks where the towers take the shells, but here you have to answer this question.

  • Build quarries and mines
  • Handle initial resources in plants
  • Produce shells
  • Deliver them to the towers.
  • Avoid traffic jams by driving routes.[/ list]

    6 types of inputs
    6 factories
    8 types of towers
    Warehouses help solve a number of transportation problems.
    More than 60 types of enemies advancing on land, in the air and on the water.
    And some even try to do something against player
    On 4 maps, the enemies go constantly, and we must first hold off their attack, and only then destroy their spawn.
    Two characters - Soldier and Engineer. Place them inside the desired building and increase its efficiency.

    Think. Many towers, but few shells? Many shells, but not enough towers? A lot of shells, but not there? Just enough, but the shells hit in traffic jams?
    All these interesting events await players.
